item.text: Where do the conflicts and where do the quarrels among you come from? Is it not from this, from your passions that battle inside you?

You <st data-num="1937" class="">desire</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have;</st> you <st data-num="5407" class="">murder</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2206" class="">envy</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you <st data-num="3756 1410">cannot</st> <st data-num="2013">obtain</st>; you <st data-num="3164" class="">quarrel</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4170" class="">fight</st>. You do <st data-num="3756">not</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">because</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="154">ask</st>;
you ask and do not receive because you ask wrongly, so you can spend it on your passions.
Adulterers, do you not know that friendship with the world means hostility toward God? So whoever decides to be the world’s friend makes himself God’s enemy.

<st data-num="2228" class="">Or</st> do you <st data-num="1380" class="">think</st> the <st data-num="1124" class="">scripture</st> means <st data-num="2761" class="">nothing</st> when it <st data-num="3004" class="">says</st>,<n id="1" /> “The <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> God<n id="2" /> caused<n id="3" /> to <st data-num="2730" class="">live</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">within</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> has an <st data-num="5355" class="">envious</st> <st data-num="1971" class="">yearning</st>”?<n id="4" />
But he gives greater grace. Therefore it says, “God opposes the proud, but he gives grace to the humble.”

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> <st data-num="5293" class="">submit</st> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="436" class="">resist</st> the <st data-num="1228" class="">devil</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he will <st data-num="5343" class="">flee</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

<st data-num="1448" class="">Draw near</st> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he will <st data-num="1448">draw near</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>. <st data-num="2511" class="">Cleanse</st> your <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st>, you <st data-num="268" class="">sinners</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="48" class="">make</st> your <st data-num="2588" class="">hearts</st> <st data-num="48" class="">pure</st>, you <st data-num="1374" class="">double-minded</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="5003" class="">Grieve</st>, <st data-num="3996" class="">mourn</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2799" class="">weep</st>. <st data-num="3344" class="">Turn</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1071" class="">laughter</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="3997" class="">mourning</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5479" class="">joy</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="2726" class="">despair</st>.
Humble yourselves before the Lord and he will exalt you.

Do not speak against one another, brothers and sisters. He who speaks against a fellow believer or judges a fellow believer speaks against the law and judges the law. But if you judge the law, you are not a doer of the law but its judge.
But there is only one who is lawgiver and judge—the one who is able to save and destroy. On the other hand, who are you to judge your neighbor?
Come now, you who say, “Today or tomorrow we will go into this or that town and spend a year there and do business and make a profit.”

<st data-num="3748" class="">You</st><n id="1" /> do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1987" class="">know</st> about <st data-num="839" class="">tomorrow</st>. <st data-num="4169" class="">What</st> is <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st> like?<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> you <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> a <st data-num="822">puff of smoke</st><n id="3" /> that <st data-num="5316" class="">appears</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">for</st> a <st data-num="3641">short time</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1899" class="">then</st> <st data-num="853" class="">vanishes</st>.

<st data-num="4771" class="">You</st> ought to <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> <st data-num="473">instead</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="1437">If</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> is <st data-num="2309" class="">willing</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">then</st> we will <st data-num="2198" class="">live</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st>.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3568">as it is</st>,<n id="1" /> you <st data-num="2744" class="">boast</st> about <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="212" class="">arrogant plans</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3956" class="">All</st> <st data-num="5108" class="">such</st> <st data-num="2746" class="">boasting</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="4190" class="">evil</st>.
So whoever knows what is good to do and does not do it is guilty of sin.
